content.title: Vegetable Development Scheme
content.details: The scheme “Vegetable Development Scheme” was launched by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya to promote vegetable production through HYV seeds/Hybrids/Improved/Open Pollinated seedlings, including assistance to farmers.
benefits: Supply of seeds/seedlings and garden tools at 50% sales subsidy.
Demonstration on improved methods of vegetable cultivation at the rate 2,600 per farmer is provisioned.
50% sale subsidy of hybrid, HYV and OP quality vegetable seeds, tools & implements.
100% assistance for 100sqm per unit area of poly house.
100% assistance limited to 200 sqm per beneficiary in trellis making.
eligibility: The applicant/farmer should be a resident of Meghalaya.
The small and marginal farmers having sufficient available cultivable land can apply under the scheme.
content.application_process: Offline. The eligible bonafide farmer can apply/write an application on plain paper and submit it at the nearest office of the Horticulture Development Officer of a CD Block/Horticulture Circle.
documents_required: Documents proof of being a small or marginal farmer

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective of the scheme is to promote vegetable production through HYV seeds/ Hybrids/ Improved/Open Pollinated seedlings, including assistance to farmers.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Department Of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya has launched this scheme.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide small and marginal farmers are eligible to apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the type of assistance/service?
faqs.answer: (i) The Scheme assists in providing hybrid, HYV, and OP quality vegetable seed, etc. to farmers at a subsidized rate. (ii) Providing poly houses to farmers for the production of off-season and high-value vegetables under protected cultivation (iii) To assist farmers in trellis making for squash and other creeper vegetables with locally available materials like bamboo wood etc.

faqs.question: What is the pattern of assistance?
faqs.answer: I) 50% sale subsidy of hybrid, HYV and OP quality vegetable seeds, tools & implements. ii) 100% assistance for 100sqm per unit area of poly house. iii) 100% assistance limited to 200 sqm per beneficiary in trellis making.

faqs.question: How to avail the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers can apply in plain paper through the nearest Horticulture Development Officer of a CD Block/ Horticulture Circle.

faqs.question: What is the beneficiaries’ selection procedure?
faqs.answer: The beneficiaries will be selected on a first come first served basis.

faqs.question: Whom can I contact in case of any queries or need for clarification?
faqs.answer: 1. District Horticulture Officer 2. Horticulture Development Officer
